description:
The Fitch Law Firm, founded by attorney John Fitch, is a personal injury firm with a long history of serving the people of Central Ohio. Our law firm's doors first opened over three decades ago in Columbus, and we have experienced continuous growth since that day. We now have five offices spread across the state, including one in Cincinnati from which we serve the people of southern Ohio who face challenges due to the following:

  • Personal injury, including motor vehicle, trucking accidents and traumatic brain injuries (TBI)
  • Medical malpractice, including bad drugs and medical devices
  • Sexual abuse

Attorney Fitch has more than 30 years of experience representing clients throughout Ohio. In that time, he has earned the respect of his clients and his peers. He has received an AV-Preeminent* peer-review rating from Martindale-Hubbell, and he is a member of the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum, which is an association for whom less than 1 percent of attorneys qualify for membership.

If you are in need of an attorney who will fight diligently to protect your rights while pursuing fair compensation for your injuries, attorney John Fitch at The Fitch Law Firm fits the description. Whether your case requires a skilled negotiator or a determined litigator, our firm's attorney has the experience you need on your side. If you want to learn more about the services our law firm offers, you can do so by scheduling a free initial consultation.

*AV-Preeminent and BV-Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the Bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
